data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of Yichun.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Yichun, Heilongjiang, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Yichun to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.section_summary: On average, 75 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Yichun, Heilongjiang, China.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Yichun, Heilongjiang, China not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Yichun. Through your servants plant 118 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Yakut people. Make the Yakut people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Yichun, Heilongjiang, China. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, we pray that the people of Yichun, Heilongjiang, China will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

data.section_summary:
the county of Yichun, Heilongjiang, China has a population of 593,900.

We estimate Yichun has 45,054 people who might know Jesus, 9,594 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 539,252 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Yichun, Heilongjiang, China.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

location.name: Yichun
location.people_groups_list: Korean, Saman, Olot, Japanese, Tatar, Khakass
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Korean (2,590,000), Saman (3,300), Olot (3,200), Japanese (7,000), Tatar, Khakass (800)
